title: [1.6.2~1.7.2][ssp/smp][汉化]Bouncing Block Mod(弹跳方块)
author: 吾问无为谓1
txt_content:
本帖最后由 吾问无为谓1 于 2014-6-11 18:51 编辑 

这个mod原来是由1847291366搬运汉化的，不过因为他很久没更新了，所以我来填坑了
这个mod添加了几种有趣的方块，可以将你弹的非常高，并且还能分方向弹


合成表

弹跳方块


发射方块


弹射方块（注：此mod仅1.7版本有）


降落方块


加速方块


以下方块在1.6版本有，但是在1.7被去掉了
弹射方块—向西


弹射方块—向南

弹射方块—向东


弹射方块—向北





食用方法


弹射方块（1.6版本的）：这个方块弹射高度相当于发射方块，不过分距离
弹跳方块


它能将你弹起这么高（约12格）


发射方块


它能将你弹起这么高（约35格）


降落方块


在掉下来时若掉在降落方块上可以免疫掉落伤害
加速方块


让你在上面走的速度加快
这是一个10格长的加速方块


站在上面只按了一下w就走了这么远


弹射方块

走上去后会沿着走的方向弹的和发射方块一样高



下载地址（1.6.2后的版本为我个人汉化）

1.6.2~1.7.2
已全部汉化，除了1.7.2的弹跳方块不知为什么死活没法汉化，class也改了，lang也改了就是没法汉化


没人看的更新记录

Version 3.0! : a day ago6/09/14Version 3.0 is now released for Minecraft 1.7.2!

Adds:
- Single Cannon Block that shoots you in the direction you are walking
- Automatic Version Checker 
Removes:
- Directional Cannon Blocks




Other Mod : about a month ago4/20/14As we approad 13,000 downloads, my next mod nears completion! Stay tuned and thanks for all th downloads and support!




Future/Thanks : 4 months ago1/29/14The mod has now reached just 9,500 downloads! Thank's everyone for all of the support! I am currently working on developing a new mod that I will most likely release in the next month or so. If you want to see the mod when I release it you can subscribe to my account. Once again, thank's everyone for making this mod as successful as it was, I appreciate it very much!




Version 2.1 : 8 months ago10/08/13New Command, use "/bouncingblocks" or "/bb" to show the version of the mod.A lot of code optimization/organizing





News : 9 months ago9/04/13Gim is working on an update that will add a new command and the a new block as well. We have also reached over 15 spotlights! Keep making them and keep an eye out for the update!




Spotlights : 9 months ago9/01/13Mod now has over 10 spotlights. If you want to make one, go ahead! Thanks!




Version 2.0 : 9 months ago8/30/13Adds the new Cannon Blocks, one for each direction. Launches you in the direction the arrow on top is pointed.Changed the recipe for Launcher Blocks.Adds the Speed Block, travel much faster while on top of this block.





Version 1.6 : 9 months ago8/24/13Adds the new Launcher Block, pushes you higher then the Bouncing Block, but isn't padded for a safe landing.Nerfs the Bouncing Block, now pushes you to a shorter height, is still padded.Increases the outcome of crafting recipes.





Version 1.5.1 : 9 months ago8/23/13See changelog in the description of the mod.
